data.name: Name
data.speciality: System Administrator | Network Administrator | Virtualization Specialist
data.about: Self-motivated fast learner. Loves System Development and Network Engineering. Experienced in both deploying and troubleshooting systems and networks for large-scale or remote environments. Mainly focus on secure result. Multi-brand device user.
